user.description: I am an enthusiastic and passionate programmer, who is always in search of new knowledge and technologies to learn. I love to challenge myself to solve problems in an Imaginative and creative way. I am considered a team player and also a good leader who is communicative and social with the teams.I have experience with many web technologies like JS,Php,MySql,etc.I consider myself as a functional part coder as I am not good with UI,Layouts and its components,But I am pretty good with logical and challenging programming thus I am in Love with Javascript due to the Sheer power and variations of applications and modules / APIs.
